applications.name: 怪兽战场
applications.description: Q版动作卡牌RPG游戏。 在游戏中玩家需要扮演某王国的骑士军团，为了国家的安全与邪恶的怪兽军团大战，游戏中你会面对许多拥有不同技能的怪物，超过30个的BOSS级凶兽，游戏的玩法非常简单，点击屏幕即可完成所有的操作。
applications.releaseNotes:
*** HUGE UPDATE ***
- All cards has been redesigned
- Add 5 new god cards
- The gad menu has been reconstituted
- Add a Fusion system
- Add a real time PVP & an asynchronous PVP
- Rebalancing

applications.name: Eets Munchies
applications.description:
一款美观的家庭版拼图智力游戏！

Eets Munchies是由Klei Entertainment全新设计、屡获殊荣的智力拼图游戏。该游戏拥有炫酷和搞笑生物，玩家在难度逐渐增加的各种智力拼图游戏中帮助饥肠辘辘的可爱生物吞食蛋糕。

applications.name: 丛林推箱子
applications.description: 类似华容道的益智游戏，推动石块让宝箱到达指定出口。
applications.releaseNotes:
- a function was added to prevent that saved games get broken if App is quit while saving
- reduced download size

applications.name: 氮气小子
applications.description: 经典的休闲游戏，玩法和炸弹人完全相同。画面精致，关卡丰富。无敌的火力，具有挑战性的敌人，操作简单，还可以拉上你的朋友对决哦。
applications.releaseNotes:
We want to say thank you for all the feedback you sent us and implemented some of your comments. 

New in this version:
- [User Feedback] Added a revenge button for multiplayer games
- [User Feedback] Level preview images
- [User Feedback] Added collected/overall star count to campaigns
- [User Feedback] More levels - new campaign was added

- [Gimmick] The flame in the menu can be grabbed an thrown away
- [Gimmick] Change player skin by touching the Nitroman at the home screen
- [Gimmick] Changing the explosion flame also changes the menu flame

- [Feature] Automatic scrolling to the last played campaign and level
- [Feature] New flames are available at the settings screen

- [Design] Facebook and Game Center icons

- [Bug] Fixed some minor bugs

applications.name: 三国战记：烽火连天
applications.description: 三国塔防激斗再升级，新增特殊兵种及神秘奖励系统。
applications.releaseNotes:
1.提高了UI界面
2.提高了运行速度

applications.name: 几何树
applications.description: 轻触屏幕即可创作，由美丽而对称的几何图案构成的树。
applications.releaseNotes:
Geom-e-Tree has some really wild new themes to chose from!

We've made the branching factor easier to change — A two-finger tap in the upper or lower half of the display increases or decreases the number of branches at each node in the Tree.

The double-tap gesture now toggles the Perfect Common Ratio Mode on or off. 

Significant Improvements:

• A Two-finger tap was introduced as the gesture for changing the branching factor up and down. The previous multiple-finger taps are no longer recognized. The new gesture makes it easy to see the effect of changing n while holding the angle and common ratio the same. (The kids' app, Geom-e-Twee, still uses just two or three fingers to directly set the number of branches to two or three.)

• We increased the maximum number of Tree branches to nine. The new gesture for changing the branching factor made it easy for us to allow 8 and 9 branched trees. Previously, a five-finger tap limited the number via gestures. We had 7 and 8-branched Reference trees in the arboretum that could be used to get a Tree of those degrees, but that was a hack.

• The double-tap gesture now toggles the Perfect Common Ratio Mode on or off. A narrow green border is displayed when a Tree is in PCR Mode.

• We added not just new themes, but new /kinds/ of themes: themes that vary line width as well as line length, themes that draw 1000's of dots at the nodes of the Tree instead of drawing branches, themes that draw nodes and branches, themes that draw nodes that vary in size, themes that draw circles at the midpoints of invisible branches, plus several other kinds of themes!

Minor changes and bug fixes:

• Tree line widths now appear (relatively) the same on all devices, and in thumbnail images, email messages, and photos. Previously, lines were not scaled consistently based on the image size. Dots (new in this version) are also scaled to match the image size.

• A red border previously was indicated when the common ratio was being constrained. Now, red prohibition signs appear in both upper corners.

• We tweaked the Rainbow theme colors, rounded the end caps, and changed the light blue background to neutral gray.  We added pivot rivets to the Pop Stick theme.

• The Arboretum was enlarged to hold 384 Trees.

• We updated our code for iOS 6 and retina devices, and improved performance.

• When sending a Tree in Email, the attachment is given a useful name. For example "2-180-1.618.jpg" means it was a 2-branched (binary) tree at 180° with common ratio 1.618.

• Geom-e-Tree's Help and Geom-e-Tree.com were updated to reflect changes, and to give you better information.

applications.name: 霓虹跑酷
applications.description: 被世界通缉追杀何等荣耀，科技感十足的跑酷游戏。

applications.name: 模型人冒险记
applications.description: 模型人冒险记是一款横版过关动作游戏，玩家需要帮助Cid闯过3个阶段，完成10个关卡，不管是下水道、沼泽、冰天雪地还是熔岩，Cid都必须勇往直前。比较特别的是游戏情节通过精美的动画视频插曲来讲述。

applications.name: 工具箱 - 实用工具集合
applications.description: 收纳使用最广泛，最实用的5款工具，全新定义移动工具，iPhone必备：手电筒，计算器，汇率转换，单位转换，尺子。
applications.releaseNotes:
1.货币排序错误修正,增加下拉刷新功能,添加Kyrgyzstan Som
2.弹出键盘添加+/-按键
3.手电筒添加闪光模式控制功能(正常,快闪,慢闪)
4.添加台湾本地化单位(台两),修复部分单位转换错误
5.更换反馈模块,更好的用户体验
6.更换按键音效
我们会在未来的更新中添加更多的实用工具,如果您有任何意见或想法请通过反馈功能和我们联系,谢谢

applications.name: 模拟人生3：世界冒险
applications.description: 一款可以在世界各地生活并学武术然后寻宝的模拟经营游戏。专为视网膜显示打造的视觉质量。环游世界看看你的市民会出现在哪里？埃及、印度、美国、加拿大、甚至是中国。
applications.releaseNotes: iOS 6 OPTIMIZED - improvements, additions, and optimizations include various behind-the-scenes adjustments to enhance application stability.
